statements: UPDATE crypto_wallet_addresses SET balance = 500.25 WHERE user_id = 123 AND currency_type = 'BTC';

UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount * 1.05, timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE tx_id = 200
